page.title: 03GHOST STORIES ETC
page.content: {THE BLOOD STAIN__}At Eastfield Grange there is a blood stain on the floor and the old lady who lived there used to scrub the floor and it used to go away and the next day it came back . She thought that somebody had died there.Her garage used to be a slaughter house and you can still see the slaughter ring. {THE WHITE LADY--}The White Lady lives in one of Petty's buildings. It is on the Richmond road. Some people say they have seen her but I do not think they have. Some people say they have seen her arm. {THE SECRET TUNNEL__}There is supposed to be a secret passage which runs from the Old Hall in the middle of the village to the Manor House or Rock Castle in Leyburn Parish.
